meta.title: Image Outliers
meta.description: Look at a series of images and detect outdoor scenes.
meta.disclaimer: Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.

instructions.simple: Press "T" when you see an outdoor scene.
steps: You will be shown several paired blocks of images.
During each block the images will change automatically after a fixed time.
You will have to press "T" as soon as you recognize an outdoor scene
Indoor scenes refer to pictures taken from the inside of any type of building: houses, museums, libraries, shops, etc.
Outdoor scenes refer to pictures taken outside a building: forests, mountains, rivers, etc.
The experiment will end if the performance is too low
